ABOUT PAGE

Create beautiful Websites in Record Time

You can relay on our amazing features list and also our customer services will be great experience for you without doubt and in no-time

Are you happy with what we offer? Grab your WrapKit Angular Blog Copy Now

components.name: NxWelcomeComponent
components.template:
Hello there, Welcome lda 👋

You're up and running

What's next?

Learning materials

Documentation Everything is in there Blog Changelog, features & events YouTube channel Nx Show, talks & tutorials Interactive tutorials Create an app, step-by-step Video courses Nx custom courses
Install Nx Console Plugin for VSCode

NxCloud Enable faster CI & better DX

You can activate distributed tasks executions and caching by running: 

nx connect-to-nx-cloud
What is Nx Cloud?
Nx is open source Love Nx? Give us a star!

Next steps

Here are some things you can do with Nx:

Add UI library 
# Generate UI lib
nx g @nrwl/angular:lib ui

# Add a component
nx g @nrwl/angular:component button --project ui
View interactive project graph 
nx graph
Run affected commands 
# see what's been affected by changes
nx affected:graph

# run tests for current changes
nx affected:test

# run e2e tests for current changes
nx affected:e2e

Carefully crafted with

components.name: TechnologiesComponent
components.templateData:
LDA
  • Tech List
  • Blog

Technology Stack

A Full Stack Developer trying to build my own website where I am trying to merge few technologies. The Website itself is made up of Frontend, Backend Technologies and also uses some cloud and ops practices. Throughout the Website there will be a journey of what technologies are listed and what is beneficial to use at what time.

Read More
LDA By Pranay

First Technology Web App that will give you context of the Technologies that you have been using and limitations that exists while using them.

© All Rights Reserved by Pranay Kekre

components.name: TopContentComponent
components.templateData:
Make your site in No-Time

WrapKit helps you to build your project in record time with fun making it.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat.

Quis nostrud exerci tation ullamcorper suscipit lobortis nisl ut aliquis would be good to have.

View Other Features

variables.name: collectionReducer
counterReducer
variables.defaultValue:
createReducer(
  initialState,
  on(increment, (state) => state + 1),
  on(decrement, (state) => state - 1),
  on(reset, (state) => 0)
)

libs/my-counter/src/lib/counter.reducer..name: counterReducer
libs/my-counter/src/lib/counter.reducer..defaultValue:

  initialState,

  on(decrement, (state) => state - 1),
  on(reset, (state) => 0)
)
